# Memory Map

```
000000-00AFFF - RAM
00B000-00BFFF - IO
00C000-00FFFF - ROM
010000-? - RAM BANKS

0000000000000000 - 1010111111111111 0000-AFFF RAM
1011000000000000 - 1011111111111111 B000-BFFF IO
1011001000000000 - 1011001111111111 B200-B2FF IO1
1011010000000000 - 1011011111111111 B400-B4FF IO2
1011011000000000 - 1011011111111111 B600-B6FF IO3
1011100000000000 -
1011101000000000
1011111000000000
1100000000000000 - 1111111111111111 C000-FFFF ROM
```
